data.title: Joint Mathematics Meetings
data.meta_description: The largest mathematics meeting in the world where a record breaking number of attendees are expected every year! The Mathematical Association of America (MAA) and the American Mathematical Society (AMS) invite you to join them for the Joint Mathematics Meetings (JMM).
